amendment.description: Amendment allocates an additional $2 million for the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy account for the SuperTruck II program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase Energy Programs, Department of Energy by $2,000,000 and reduce Departmental Administration, Department of Energy by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. McNerney.
